channel.title: burp suite on 10degres
channel.description: Recent content in burp suite on 10degres

item.title: Colorize your hunt
item.description: As a full time bug hunter, it’s important to use the tools you are confortable with, sometimes a small improvement can change your life. During the great 3 days course presented by Nicolas Gr√©goire, he showed us a browser called Autochrome. Combined with a tiny Burp Suite extension, it becomes very easy to visualize the things you really want to see and reduce the noise for your eyes. In this article I will show you my current configuration.
